TopicTitle: The Milkomedan Odyssey -- A Sci-Fi Original from Me!

Articles.Content:
Hello, everyone! You all probably don't know, but I am usually bad at writing stories. I can think of lots of ideas, only for them to end up bad on paper. However, this story is an original that I am proud with., since it is rather unique, and the first one that has more than 3000 words per chapter.

—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

Read it here: https://www.fictionpress.com/s/3321888/1/The-Milkomeda-Odyssey
Planned number of chapters: 20-30
Current amount: 1
